column4: trying to fix the sound-juicer bug in 10.04 with multi cd titles, added the repository ppa;phw/musicbrainz to the repos and updated, now got 2.28.1-3 installed but the bug is still there, any one know whats wrong?
in 10.04 it has a setting for what to do on ac power when lid is closed, did you change that setting/
